Comment: He's an imbecile but he's always been a politician.  His businesses dealt directly with consumers.  I can't imagine a reality where he would deliberately say that a 3rd of the American public was stupid, especially in the 80s when conservatism was at a zenith under Reagan.   He had a hard enough time staving off bankruptcies without deliberately alienating 10s of millions of people.  What is happening to Musk today would have happened to Trump then.  The still photo most commonly used in the memes that portend that he said it, are from an Oprah appearance, where he never said that.   He happily called politicians stupid, but not an entire group of voters.
